concerts.name: Aqua Music Fest @ Asiatique
concerts.description:
Aqua Music Festival 2025 is an upcoming outdoor music event that promises an unforgettable experience with performances from top Thai artists. 

 PURPEECH / LITTLE JOHN / SAFEPLANET / 1LIFE / ONLY MONDAY / BADMIXY and more

concerts.name: 2023 TRINITY BREATH OF DESIRE CONCERT
concerts.description: The 2023 TRINITY: BREATH OF DESIRE CONCERT was a highly anticipated event by the Thai boy band TRINITY. Known for their captivating performances and strong fanbase, TRINITY took the stage for an exciting and emotional concert, showcasing their musical talents, charm, and engaging stage presence.

concerts.name: 'NCT 127 2nd Tour' - 'Neo City: The Link'
concerts.description:
"NCT 127 2nd Tour: Neo City – The Link" is the second concert tour by NCT 127, the subunit of the popular South Korean boy group NCT. This tour follows their previous successful concerts, continuing their global expansion with an immersive and dynamic performance.

 The concert theme "Neo City – The Link" represents the group's connection with their fans, known as "NCTzens", and their journey through music. The show features a blend of powerful performances, intricate choreography, and visually stunning stage designs. Audiences can expect to hear a mix of songs from their various albums, including hits like "Cherry Bomb", "Kick It", and "Sticker.

concerts.name: 4EVE Concert 'NOW OR NEVER'
concerts.description: 4EVE's 'NOW OR NEVER' concert is a high-energy live event featuring the popular Thai girl group 4EVE. Known for their powerful performances and catchy music, the group brought their unique blend of pop and hip-hop to the stage, delivering an unforgettable experience for their fans. The concert showcases their hit songs and charismatic stage presence, combining vibrant visuals, dynamic choreography, and interactive moments with the audience. The 'NOW OR NEVER' concert is a celebration of the group's success, offering fans a chance to connect with them through music and performance in an exciting and unforgettable way.

concerts.name: SEVENTEEN WORLD TOUR 'Be the Sun'
concerts.description:
SEVENTEEN WORLD TOUR 'Be the Sun' is a global tour by SEVENTEEN, showcasing their vibrant energy and connection with fans. Named after their album 'Face the Sun,' the tour features high-energy performances, emotional ballads, and stunning visuals. Fans can enjoy hits like 'Don't Wanna Cry,' 'Left & Right,' and 'HOT,' with grand stage designs and powerful choreography. 'Be the Sun' celebrates SEVENTEEN’s growth and their bond with CARAT fans.

Expect an unforgettable show filled with excitement and passion.

concerts.name: PP Krit's 'MY PLEASURE CONCERT'
concerts.description: PP Krit's 'MY PLEASURE CONCERT' is an exciting live performance by the Thai artist PP Krit Amnuaydechkorn. The concert is designed to showcase his musical journey, offering fans an unforgettable experience. Known for his soulful voice and captivating stage presence, PP Krit will perform a selection of his popular songs, blending both upbeat tracks and emotional ballads. Expect a vibrant atmosphere with stunning visuals and an engaging production, making it a night full of energy and emotion. His dedicated fanbase will enjoy an immersive performance that highlights his growth as an artist.

concerts.name: 'Red Velvet 2nd Concert' - 'Redmare'
concerts.description:
Thai Fans, don't tell me you've never had a sweet NIGHTMARE.....? 

 SM True is leading you to experience the mystery and sweetness of nightmare this September with the popular girl group “Red Velvet” in their first concert in Thailand.

 The only chance to meet the unparalleled charms and unique colors of “Red Velvet” through their mega hit songs and dazzling performances. Be ready to discover the mysterious and thrilling experience together! More information will be announced soon, please stay tuned on SM True Facebook page. #RedVelVet_REDMAREinBKK

concerts.name: 'TWICE 5th World Tour' - 'Ready to Be'
concerts.description:
TWICE's 5th World Tour 'Ready to Be' is a celebration of their incredible journey as a global K-pop sensation. The tour features energetic performances, stunning visuals, and fan-favorite hits from their extensive discography. With the theme 'Ready to Be,' TWICE embraces their growth, showcasing their music, choreography, and unique charm. Fans can expect a high-energy show filled with excitement, powerful performances, and heartwarming moments with ONCE fans around the world.

It's an unforgettable experience of music, dance, and connection.

concerts.name: Nont Tanont 'Shining' Concert
concerts.description: he Nont Tanont 'Shining' Concert is a highly anticipated live performance by the Thai pop sensation, Nont Tanont. Known for his powerful vocals and emotional depth, Nont's concert is designed to be a celebration of his musical journey and his connection with fans.

concerts.name: WATER WAR CHIANG MAI 2025
concerts.description:
Water War Chiang Mai 2025 is an annual music festival held during the Songkran festival, featuring top Thai artists and vibrant water-themed festivities. 

 The festival promises an immersive experience with impressive water effects, including a 20-meter-high water spray system, creating a lively and refreshing atmosphere. Attendees are encouraged to dress in white attire to align with this year's 'White Songkran' theme. 

 BODYSLAM / SLOT MACHINE / TAITOSMITH / THREE MAN DOWN / 
 NONT TANONT / POTATO/ BIG ASS / PERSES / MEAN Band

concerts.name: 'NEO CITY' The Origin Tour
concerts.description:
'NEO CITY: The Origin Tour' is NCT 127's special tour, celebrating the roots and evolution of the group. The tour features iconic performances, showcasing their growth and musical journey. With a mix of powerful songs, dynamic choreography, and stunning stage production, this tour offers fans an unforgettable experience as NCT 127 connects with NCTzens around the world. The tour highlights their signature style and energy, making it a must-see event for fans.

Expect a night filled with electrifying performances and fan interactions.

concerts.name: 'Born Pink' World Tour
concerts.description:
'Born Pink' World Tour is BLACKPINK's global concert tour, celebrating the release of their album *Born Pink*. The tour features high-energy performances of their chart-topping hits like 'How You Like That,' 'Lovesick Girls,' and 'Pink Venom.' With dazzling stage designs, powerful choreography, and unforgettable fan interactions, BLACKPINK delivers an immersive experience for Blinks worldwide. The tour highlights their global influence and musical evolution, promising an unforgettable night of music and excitement.

Get ready for a spectacular showcase of talent, style, and energy.

concerts.name: V Violette Live at Peak-A-Boo
concerts.description:
Violette Wautier Live at Peak-A-Boo is an electrifying live concert event showcasing the versatile Thai artist, Violette Wautier. Known for her unique blend of pop, indie, and R&B influences, this concert brings a mix of emotional ballads and high-energy tracks, allowing Violette to showcase both her vocal prowess and engaging stage presence.

The performance features a dynamic setlist of her hit songs, as well as some intimate moments with the audience, where Violette's powerful voice takes center stage. The concert's theme, 'Peak-A-Boo,' is reflected in the high-energy atmosphere, with stunning visuals, vibrant lighting, and immersive production, creating an unforgettable experience for her fans. Expect a mix of visual artistry and intimate, personal connections with the audience, making it a must-see event for any fan of Violette's music.

concerts.name: Slot Machine EXIT TO ENTER WORLD TOUR 2024
concerts.description:
Slot Machine EXIT TO ENTER WORLD TOUR 2024 is the highly anticipated world tour by one of Thailand's most iconic rock bands, Slot Machine. Known for their electrifying performances and powerful blend of rock, alternative, and pop influences, this tour is a celebration of their music and their long-standing career. 

 The 'EXIT TO ENTER' tour is set to take fans on a journey through their greatest hits, as well as some of their latest tracks, offering a mix of high-energy rock anthems and more introspective ballads. With stunning visuals, top-notch production, and engaging live performances, the tour promises to be an unforgettable experience. 

 Slot Machine's reputation for delivering incredible live shows is reflected in this world tour, where theyll bring their music to fans across multiple cities worldwide. Fans can expect to experience the band's passionate stage presence, and their music that bridges the gap between Thai and international rock audiences. It's an exciting opportunity to see Slot Machine perform live on a grand scale, celebrating the universal power of music.

concerts.name: TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR 'ACT: LOVE SICK'
concerts.description: TOMORROW X TOGETHER's 'ACT: LOVE SICK' World Tour is a captivating global concert series that showcases their growth as artists. With powerful performances of hits like 'Blue Hour,' 'LO$ER=LO♡ER,' and 'Anti-Romantic,' the tour delivers an unforgettable experience filled with high-energy choreography and deep emotional connection. The 'ACT: LOVE SICK' theme reflects the group's exploration of love, youth, and inner struggles, offering fans a visually stunning and immersive show. Expect a night of passion, music, and unforgettable moments with MOA.

concerts.name: 2024 NCT DREAM WORLD TOUR : THE DREAM SHOW 3
concerts.description: The 2024 NCT DREAM WORLD TOUR: THE DREAM SHOW 3 is a highly anticipated global concert that promises spectacular performances and stunning visuals. Fans can expect a dynamic setlist of the group's biggest hits and new tracks, showcasing their versatility. The tour will feature state-of-the-art production, with intricate stage designs, lighting, and LED screens, aligning with NCT DREAM's futuristic concept. The theme celebrates fulfilling dreams and bringing fans closer through music. Known for their strong fan connection, NCT DREAM will engage with the audience, making the concert an unforgettable experience. This world tour will take the group to multiple cities, connecting with fans globally.

concerts.name: aespa LIVE TOUR-SYNK:PARALLEL LINE-inBANGKOK
concerts.description:
aespa LIVE TOUR - SYNK:PARALLEL LINE in BANGKOK is an exciting concert event by the popular K-pop girl group aespa, known for their futuristic concepts and powerful performances. This live tour, part of their SYNK: PARALLEL LINE series, brings their mesmerizing music and dynamic stage presence to Bangkok. Fans can expect a thrilling experience with a setlist featuring aespa's biggest hits, including tracks from their latest releases, showcasing their unique blend of electronic pop and captivating choreography.

The concert will feature high-tech production, impressive visuals, and stunning lighting, reflecting aespa's virtual world concept. With their strong connection to fans and incredible stage charisma, aespa will create unforgettable moments of fan interaction. SYNK:PARALLEL LINE in BANGKOK will be a must-see event for fans in Thailand, combining powerful live performances with the group's innovative style.

concerts.name: Three Man Down Live Concert Presented by REACT
concerts.description:
Three Man Down Live Concert Presented by REACT is an electrifying live performance by the popular Thai band Three Man Down. Known for their emotional lyrics and energetic pop-rock style, the band will deliver an unforgettable night of music, featuring a mix of their most loved songs and new hits.

This concert promises to be an immersive experience, with stunning visuals, dynamic lighting, and top-notch production that enhances the band's already captivating stage presence. Fans can expect an intimate and exciting atmosphere, with opportunities for fan interaction and moments of connection with the band. Whether you’re a longtime fan or new to their music, Three Man Down Live Concert is set to be a memorable night of heartfelt performances and vibrant energy, making it a must-attend event for any fan of Thai music.

concerts.name: TILLY BIRDS MOUNTAIN CONCERT
concerts.description:
The TILLY BIRDS MOUNTAIN CONCERT is an exciting live event by the Thai indie-pop band Tilly Birds. Known for their catchy melodies, heartfelt lyrics, and laid-back yet energetic performances, the band will bring their unique sound to the stage in an unforgettable concert experience.

This concert will feature a selection of Tilly Birds' most popular songs, showcasing their mix of indie, pop, and rock influences. With stunning visuals, vibrant lighting, and a scenic stage design inspired by nature, the Mountain Concert aims to create an immersive experience for fans. The event’s theme connects the band’s love for music with the beauty of the outdoors, offering a refreshing atmosphere and memorable performances. Fans can look forward to an intimate night with the band, filled with emotion, energy, and a deep connection with the music.

concerts.name: EXO PLANET #5 - EXplOration - in BANGKOK
concerts.description:
EXO PLANET #5 - EXplOration - in BANGKOK is the highly anticipated live concert event by the legendary K-pop group EXO. As part of their fifth concert tour, EXplOration, EXO brings their electrifying performances to Bangkok, offering an unforgettable experience for their devoted fans. Known for their powerful vocals, sharp choreography, and engaging stage presence, EXO will perform a mix of their biggest hits, including songs from their latest albums, showcasing their versatility and artistry.

The concert will feature an immersive production with cutting-edge visuals, stunning lighting effects, and elaborate stage designs, creating a truly spectacular atmosphere. Fans can expect emotional ballads, high-energy tracks, and plenty of fan interaction, making this event a memorable experience for EXO-Ls. EXO PLANET #5 - EXplOration - in BANGKOK promises to be a thrilling night filled with incredible performances and powerful moments, solidifying EXO's status as one of the top global K-pop groups.
